name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.8:35551/?a=hkZ2m0MuNrmDhRkilo7qQZmFLjz_9OK5VE6qINrReLuXTvGWRacYXumO98PYHnBicTFsDrSOFbz523lNQwUM3l0IdvuBMDNz HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:33719/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
